name: Introduction to Passivhaus
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Is Passivhaus worth the care and attention needed to get it to work and is it appropriate for the UK environment? How does Passivhaus compare with other low energy approaches to sustainability? This session explores these issues in relation to the ZED Factory zero energy system and the code for sustainable homes.

presentations.name: ZED zero bills specification as a UK specific
presentations.speakers:
Bill Dunster, Principal, The ZEDfactory
Neil Jefferson, CEO, Zero Carbon Hub

presentations.name: Case studies - pros and cons of ZED, Passivhaus and Code Level 5
Key benefits of different building standards that can be carried over to other projects
presentations.speakers: Mark Gillott, Chair in Sustainable Building Design and Co-Director, Institute of Sustainable Energy Technology, Nottingham University
